username.description: This can be a Cluster-scoped or SVM-scoped account, depending on whether a Cluster-level or SVM-level API is required. For more information, please read the documentation U(https://goo.gl/BRu78Z).

name.description: The name of the role to manage.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the ONTAP instance.

vserver.description: The name of the vserver to use.

access_level.description: The name of the role to manage.

state.description: Whether the specified user should exist or not.

command_directory_name.description: The command or command directory to which the role has an access.
